Protocol_16 - testing the sider gap skinny bars (2ON 6OFF) (2ON 6OFF)

## Protocol Parameters

| Parameter | Value |
|:----------|:------|
| Conditions | 3 |
| Patterns Used | 3 |
| t_acclim | 20s |
| t_pause | 0.015 |


## Conditions

| # | Pattern | Speed | Duration | Description |
|--:|:--------|------:|---------:|:------------|
| 1 | [Pattern 4](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_04.qmd) | 5 | -s | standard 4ON 4OFF |
| 2 | [Pattern 11](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_11.qmd) | 12 | -s | 2ON 6OFF |
| 3 | [Pattern 15](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_15.qmd) | 12 | -s | 6ON 2OFF |
